helpdialogintroduction: Hello! I'm **Ylias**, a shapeshifter that is here to help! Here is a list of the commands I can answer to:
helpdialogend: As you can see, some commands can take parameters. A parameter is indicated by a pair of parenthesis. When you type the command, you shall not type these parenthesis. If you see parameters in *italic*, that means they are optionnal. If you need more help, ask **Elian Wonhalf**. He's the dumbass that created me, he should know.

cleverbotio_bot_suspected: **whispers to the others** Hey people... I don't mean to freak you out, but I think that %% is a bot. He answers way too quickly...
cleverbotio_not_ready: Wait wait %%, I didn't even have enough time to wake up properly, Elian just started me right now... Can I get some coffee please?
no_last_command: %%, no command was executed on this channel since I joined. Sorry :/ .
unauthorized_command_message_to_owner: %% tried to execute command %% with arguments "%%" but doesn't have the right to. %%
unauthorized_command_message_to_member: Sorry, %%, you don't have the right to execute this command.
unknown_command: %%? I don't know this command, sorry, %%... You can get the command list by typing %%help :) .
check_permission_error: Sorry %%, there has been a problem while retrieving your permissions.
get_denied_command_list_error: Sorry %%, there has been a problem while retrieving the list.
help_dialog_sent_confirmation: I just sent you a list of the commands I can answer to in DM, %%.
help_dialog_send_error: Sorry %%, there has been an error while sending the help dialog.

fail: The member %% just joined server %%, but I couldn't send him a private message because of a database error... Can you handle it?

description: Shows a member avatar in the chat, wider
not_found: Sorry %%, but I didn't find this member...
client_avatar_author: My avatar has been created by Miago: %%

description: Displays a random AWW
fail: Welp... Seems like Reddit just crashed. I'm sorry %% :( ...

description: Displays a random cat
fail: Welp... Seems like random.cat just crashed. I'm sorry %% :( ...

description: This command kills me. I mean... Literally
speech:
Oh, so it's like that? So you're tired of me? Alright. You really think you can get rid of me just like that? You really think it's that easy? Yo, I'm crazy! I can handle paradoxes without a flinch!

"This sentence is wrong."

description: You have two (or more) options, you have to make a choice, and you just can't make your mind? Let me help :D
wrong_format: %%, You ask me to pick one, but... You only have one to pick... It doesn't make any sense D: !

description: Allows you to delete a server's welcome message
not_found: %%, The welcome message you're asking me to delete doesn't exist. I guess it's good news?

description: You can ask a bot like me to describe a picture!
wait: Alright %%, just let me a few seconds...
error: You forgot to give me a picture :| ...

description: Displays a random dog
fail: Welp... Seems like random.dog just crashed. I'm sorry %% :( ...

description: Allows you to execute javascript commands and display the return value.
exception: Well done, %%, you code almost made me crash!

description: Displays a random picture
not_found: Welp... Seems like there is no result for your search. I'm sorry %% :( ...
fail: Welp... Seems like Getty API just crashed. I'm sorry %% :( ...

success:
%%, The welcome message for this server is the following:

not_found: %%, I don't have any welcome message for that server

description: Everyone needs a little love one day or another. Hey, who said bots can't feel love?

1: **Turns into an octopus and hugs himself with his tentacles <3**
2: **Grabs his own torso to hug himself tight <3**
3: **Grabs a pillow, draws his avatar on it and hugs it <3**

1: **Turns into a white fox, sneakity sneakily crawls in high herbs, stays still, wags, and JUMPS on %% to hug him tight!**
3: Come here so I can hug you, %% ! **hugs tight**
5: **Sneakity sneakily crawls in a hole and jumps out of the earth to hold %% in his arms**
6: **Swings from rope to rope and jumps in %%'s arms**
7: **Throws a teddy bear to %%'s head while shouting "HUG"**
8: **Turns into an octopus and holds %% with his tentacles**
9: **Turns into a snake and holds %% tight**

description: Displays a random picture
not_found: Welp... Seems like there is no result for your search. I'm sorry %% :( ...
fail: Welp... Seems like Imgur API just crashed. I'm sorry %% :( ...

description: Allows you to generate a meme of type (type) with the text (top text) at the top of it and the text (bottom text) at the bottom of it if it has been filled
parse_error: Sorry %%, but you did not write the command correctly, I don't understand what you want.
not_found: Sorry %%, but this meme type doesn't exist... You should try !memelist to get the list of the meme types that exist !
fail: Sorry %%, seems like Imgflip has crashed...

description: I can send you in private the list of the available memes
finished: Just sent you the available meme list in private, %%!

description: Who's up for ping pong? Oh, sorry. Table tennis u_u
Allows you to allow or deny a command access to someone
wrong_format: %%, We got a problem. I think you made a mistake while typing the command, I didn't understand a thing.
wrong_user: %%, We got a problem. I don't know which member you want to register a permission from. I need the member ID, right? Well, you can highlight him with an @, I will translate it.
granted_parse_error: %%, You wanna grant or deny, there? It's not really crystal clear ._. ...
success: %%, The permission has been successfully registered :) !
fail: %%, There has been an error during registering, sorry :/ .

description: Allows you to register a member to the staff and subscribe him to the new member notifications
private_channel_error: %%, I need you to execute this command on a server so I know which one you're talking about.
no_mention: %%, You haven't mentionned anyone in your message, how am I supposed to know who to register?
fail: %%, There has been an error during save, sorry :/ ...
success: %%, The member has been successfully registered in the staff and subscribed to the notifications :) !

description: I can imitate lots of animals
Allows you to change my avatar
network_error: %%, The request failed, are you sure the address is correct?
fail: %%, The avatar change didn't work, are you sure your URL goes to an image?
answer: %%, My avatar has been successfully changed :D !

description: Allows you to change my lang
wrong_format: You forgot to tell me in which lang I should speak...
wrong_lang: I am sorry, but I don't know this lang :/ ...
answer: Okay, my lang has been successfully changed :) !

description: Allows you to set the welcome message that will be sent to the members who join this server
wrong_format: %%, We got a problem. I think you got mistaken while typing the command... I did not understand a thing.

description: Wanna play slot machines? Well, there is no money implied but it's still fun.
too_much_tries: You tried too hard today, %%, come back tomorrow :D !

description: Allows you to delete a previously registered permission
wrong_format: %%, We got a problem. I think you made a mistake while typing the command, I didn't understand a thing.
wrong_user: %%, We got a problem. I don't know which member you want to unregister a permission from. I need the member ID, right? Well, you can highlight him with an @, I will translate it.
not_found: %%, The permission you're asking me to delete doesn't exist. I guess it's good news?
success: %%, The permission has been successfully unregistered :) !
fail: %%, There has been an error during unregistering, sorry :/ .

description: Allows you to delete a member from the staff
private_channel_error: %%, I need you to execute this command on a server so I know which one you're talking about.
no_mention: %%, You haven't mentionned anyone in your message, how am I supposed to know who to delete?
not_found: %%, The member you want to delete from the staff is already not part of the staff. I guess that's good news?
fail: %%, There has been an error during save, sorry :/ ...
success: %%, The member has been successfully deleted from the staff :) !

description: I can look up an article on Wikipedia and write the beginning here if you want
parse_error: %%, You wanna make a search on Wikipedia without... Search terms?
fail: Seems like Wikipedia crashed. Didn't think that day would come! Sorry %%!
not_found: 23 19, WE GOT A 23 19!! Oh, wait, it's a 404, sorry. Well, the page you asked for doesn't exist on Wikipédia. Sorry, %% !

description: Allows you to make a search on YouTube
wait: Wait a moment, %%, I'm asking YouTube if he's got something...
fail: Welp... Seems like YouTube has crashed. How strange... I'm sorry %% :( ...
error: Welp... YouTube told me there has been an error. I think we reached the search quota for today! I'm sorry %% :( ...
not_found: Welp... YouTube didn't find anything for you. I'm sorry %% :( ...

error_sql_server_retrieval: SQL server returned an error while retrieving data
error_sql_server_saving: SQL server returned an error while saving data

error_sql_server_retrieval: SQL server returned an error while retrieving data
error_sql_server_deleting: SQL server returned an error while deleting data

5: Someone told me a lot about this one. Won't tell you who, though c: .

4: To make this choice is a big responsibility. But I'm ready. I pick %%.

location_private: It was on a private conversation (date : %%).
location_public: It was on server %% and on channel #%% (date : %%).
